description:
Cushion, coverage, and temperature regulating merino wool, these socks have it all. The minimalist design, mesh zones and reinforced toes keep your feet happy while you're out in the backcountry.

  • Made of soft merino and synthetic blend
  • 4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place
  • Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for durability and comfort
  • Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for an irritation-free wear
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Winding Trail Crew Socks - Unisex
